org.transitime.avl

Class AvlJmsClientModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.modules.Module
      • org.transitime.avl.AvlJmsClientModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AvlJmsClientModule
extends Module
    Reads AVL data from JMS topic and processes it. Can use multiple threads to do the processing.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith

    • Constructor Detail

      • AvlJmsClientModule

        public AvlJmsClientModule(java.lang.String agencyId)
                   throws javax.jms.JMSException,
                          javax.naming.NamingException
        Constructor. start() needs to be run to actually start the thing.
        Parameters:
        agencyId - Specifies name of JMS topic to read AVL data from. Topic name is clientName + "-AVLTopic".
        Throws:
        javax.naming.NamingException
        javax.jms.JMSException

    • Method Detail

      • getTopicName

        public static java.lang.String getTopicName(java.lang.String agencyId)
        Returns the name of the JMS topic to be used for the AVL feed.
        Parameters:
        agencyId - Topic name is clientName + "-AVLTopic".
        Returns:
        the topic name for the AVL feed

      • run

        public void run()
        So that Runnable interface used for each thread. Makes sure that runs continuously even if an exception is thrown. Should not be called directly.
